game.name: Kuromaku
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 캡션 이용 가능, 음량 개별 조정, 게임 메뉴 음성 안내, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Kuromaku | 黒幕 Is An Indie First-Person Psychological Thriller Experienced From A Child’s Perspective. Complete Chores Assigned By Your Mother, Uncover Hidden Secrets, And Survive Unsettling Encounters. Objectives Must Be Completed To Progress Further Into The Rich, Unfolding Story.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Kuromaku | 黒幕 Is An Indie First-Person Psychological Thriller Experienced From A Child’s Perspective. Complete Chores Assigned By Your Mother, Uncover Hidden Secrets, And Survive Unsettling Encounters. Objectives Must Be Completed To Progress Further Into The Rich, Unfolding Story.
